name: RoteIt(RoteMemorization)
0:
”Alexa, open Teacher Robot.”
”Alexa, start Teacher Robot.”
”Alexa, ask Teacher Robot for Word Practice.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teacher robot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Rote It is a full service provided by roteitbeta.com to enable learners to become successful spellers through audio learning (scientifically proven) and consistent quiz/review cycles. Detailed metrics are provided as insight into progress and challenge areas. Sign up here: https://www.roteitbeta.com .

Please note that during the Rote It Skill installation, your permission to access your Full Name and email is required for account creation in our systems. Further, we require ZIP code information to optimize our service delivery. Please review our Privacy Policy to know that we will never sell or share your personal information.
